website_summaries.verdict: This powerful unit offers 9,000 BTU of cooling power, more than enough for a room or small home.
pros: With none of the upkeep of ice-powered models, this is a capable choice that pumps in cool air using eco-friendly refrigerants
Quiet operation and simple temperature controls
cons: The exhaust unit does not fit all window types

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t have ordered a more perfect air conditioner!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing air conditioner!! Not only Does it work perfectly but the noise is so soothing. My husband compared it to white noise. I feel like it actually helps me sleep better. It can get so hot in our house, especially because we can’t open our windows since we have strictly indoor cats. This is worth every pound and I will be saving up to purchase another!! It’s a little heavy but that is not a real complaint. It’s a lovely unit and I am so thankful for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Efficient for the coolness but very noisy !
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a Dyson Fan and then I thought having cool air would be nicer during this heatwave so I got this AC unit. It does the job and our bedroom is really cool, but the noise level is really high and we didn’t manage to have the sleep button work last night(that was the first night) so we’ll try again tonight. The sash window kit is very useful !
customer_reviews.author: Elodie d'Albignac

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic piece of kit. It makes my bedroom lovely and cool so I can sleep peacefully whilst outside my door the heat and humidity are hellish. TIP: If you have an oscillating fan, especially up and down and side to side, place it in front of the AC. Heat rises, so the fan helps to circulate the cold air and force out the hot air. My room was 32 degrees. In 1 hour 20 minutes, the temperature went down to 24.5 degrees. Considering what the unit is doing, it is pretty quiet too. I find the noise it makes rather soothing and I have no trouble hearing the TV. Best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little air conditioning unit, it works well to effectively cool our 5mx5m bedroom - which is the hottest room in the house. Keep the door closed and vent through a window with a window seal and it works a treat. It is noisy, there is not denying that. However, It's no more noisy than any other unit. My personal opinion is that it's worth the noise for a nice cool room to sleep in. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an AC unit.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: If you need quiet to sleep perhaps not this unit
customer_reviews.text: Effective, though it is quite noisy. The window kit is for sash or sliding windows only but a sheet of hardboard and 30 minutes allowed construction of a suitable window attachment using the adaptor from the window kit. Only time will tell if the noise is too loud to sleep with long-term
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work as it should
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on amzon reviews and after using it i think they were made up....it costs premium its really noisy and on a hot day it simply wont make a difference. I bough widow seal kit i tried repositioning and watch plenty of youtube videos telling you how to optimize it- nothing worked. On a hot day it would drop the temp by like 1-2 degrees which lets face it for 400 pounds its pretty poor, i have 20 pound fans doing better job and they nowhere near as noisy or power hungry.... Sent it back for credit. Also be careful you will have to pay for sending it you you will be out of pocket...
customer_reviews.author: dogman

customer_reviews.title: The best Portable air conditioning unit Ever !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Inventor Appliances one Chilly and one Magic I love there products, there reliable , they are quiet and good for the environment. I am now able to sleep better cause of inventor and them hot sticky nights are just a memory. What also is refreshing is inventor outstanding customer service I have contacted them twice and each experience is a positive one and no request is dealt with swiftly and in a professional Manner. So if you are looking for a reliable Air conditioning unit then please consider inventor as they will do you proud with there long 2 year guarantee and excellent customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Marritt

customer_reviews.title: It WAS good, for 2 months and then... :/
customer_reviews.text: This air-con WAS great value for the money for the first 2 months. But it very quickly seems to have lost all ability to cool the air. It was previously managing to get the room to 21/22, but now struggles to get the room below 26, when it is 27 with windows open. So almost no real difference than just having the windows open with a normal fan now! Shame..
customer_reviews.author: Jag

customer_reviews.title: Good portable aircon. Does what is needed and then can be stored away.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this portable aircon as it cools the room well, is quiet (in my opinion - I can sleep with it on) and after the summer you can store it away in a cupboard and bring it back out when the heatwave comes back. Having bought a unit for the loft room in 2019, we bought a second unit this summer of 2020 for a different room. Unfortunately it wasn’t working well and making a terrible noise. We knew that wasn’t right because our first unit is quiet. They had excellent after sales care and resolved the situation for us. Now our second unit works as well as the first.
customer_reviews.author: Urs

customer_reviews.title: Very good portable air con.
customer_reviews.text: I had to write this review (I don't write many). I have had air cons in other countries. This portable aircon at 9,000 btu has been absolutely great. It is not a noisy aircon. It completely cools down the bedroom and small landing and that is it. (it is 9,000 btu so to expect anymore is unreasonable). We have had a hole drilled through the bedroom wall and this nicely fits into the connection (instead of opening a window). We will put the aircon away when not needed. It has been a much needed relief and has been on non stop during this heatwave. Very reliable and really cooling the bedroom down for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: pepelerue

customer_reviews.title: Solved my hot weather crisis!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to deal with the recent heat wave. Unit was well packaged and works as advertised. Room was cooled to 17c within minutes of operating. I have been monitoring the power usage via my Solar edge energy monitoring app and it looks to be pulling about 1KW of energy while cooling the room. The unit is heavy so bare that in mind, it does however have built in wheels so as long as your carting it around a level floor and don't plan on lugging it up and down stairs you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rundle

customer_reviews.title: Great AC, does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Great AC definitely helped us during the heatwave, takes a little while to throw the hot air out of the room so give it a chance then it's lovely and crispy cool inside or nice and chilly. We had one little problem when we first got it which was our window was too high so had to buy extension for pipe, so couldn't use it straight away. And also with the fan function there's no oscillation so if you are not sat directly in line with it it doesn't help much. But definitely good as an AC.
customer_reviews.author: Dil

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: Initially very noisy, contacted customer support who immediately replaced the unit, great! New unit is just as noisy, if the unit is left at 17, on auto and cool setting, after a couple of minutes something kicks in and a loud hum comes from the unit. Having never owned a AC unit im not sure if this is normal or not. If i set the tempature to 24 then the humming stops. Otherwise keeps the room very cool, just too noisy to sleep with so i run it before bedtime, which works well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N. Roddy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this aircon unit , slim and modern look it is bit heavy 2 person lift up stairs mine in my bed room double size works great !! Vented mine though the wall , if you're going to vent though window you need to order kit for side vent as chilly one is only good for sliding ones ( like patio door) when you register warranty they ask for invoice number ( online) you don't get one save Amazon email or print for your receipt
customer_reviews.author: Alan P.

customer_reviews.title: Portable air con that you can sleep with
customer_reviews.text: Sleep well with this on, a real night saver in the hot summer. Got so used to it we still have the fan mode on at night in October! Not too large as well, so highly recommended. Only issue is if the air con kicks in and out during the night so we just set it on 18 degrees and it never gets there so the inverter stays on all night and Zzzzzzz. Grab it if you can as these always sell out early in the season.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Insanity

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money air con unit
customer_reviews.text: Having really researched the A/C market, I have found a unit that is not too heavy, easy to set up, easy to move and which is quiet!. The Inventor Chilly IS quiet compared to other makes. I will be able to sleep with it on. The castors make it stable and maneuverable. It weighs 10kgs LESS than other 9000kw units. I was concerned that the head office is in Greece. However, after emailing them, I was assured that any problems within the warranty period would be dealt with here in the UK. The two year guarantee gives peace of mind. Just wish I'd bought one earlier.....
customer_reviews.author: halton

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping outside in winter
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking at buying a air con unit for some time now, with summers getting warmer I struggle sleeping in the heat so after searching and reading reviews I chose the inventor chilly. Our bedroom is quite small so after setting this up on the first night, I put it on an hour before bed, it was honestly like walking into winter when we went to bed. Some reviews have said it’s quite noisy but too be honest I find it quite soothing having the low rumbling sound, I would wholeheartedly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: CLCAP71

customer_reviews.title: Good but noisy
customer_reviews.text: The pros are that it cooled down a bedroom. The window adapter works well on a sash window. The cons are it’s heavy, noisy even on low fan setting with a bit of an underlying rattle noise. However I managed to sleep through it as it is white noise. A lighter sleeper might not. Sleep mode doesn’t seem to do a lot. Did not cool down an attic room which gets up past 30 degrees much
customer_reviews.author: C. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy and difficult to return
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like that the unit was very noisy in use. The fan didn't slow down if if the required temperature was met. I'm not totally convinced that my unit worked properly. Also this was very difficult to return as I had to return it myself and reclaim the postage. This unit weighed 29Kg and it wasn't the easiest of items to return.
customer_reviews.author: Gazzajam

customer_reviews.title: Noisey as hell
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if my unit is broken or something but I'm recording a MINIMUM of 52dB noise using the lowest possible fan settings (cool mode). That's with me sitting in my office chair, up close it's more like 55-60dB. Is this normal? The description states 52 as the maximum during sleep mode, which actually seems to increase the fan speed and the noise levels when I activate it... I feel like my neighbours hate me whenever I turn this thing on, I can't imagine how bad it is on a high setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: We just upgraded to this version of an air conditioning unit and can tell you that it is NOT noisy. It does make a noise but nothing more than a muffle really which is not enough to disturb sleeping and keeps the room lovely and cool. Extremely pleased with this product. We had the previous model to this and THAT was noisy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself in Lockdown
customer_reviews.text: I have stopped myself for many years from buying AirCon, since we are all lockdown at the moment I just decided if it’s hit this summer I need to be cool. Dropped the temp from 27 to 19 in about 3 hours
customer_reviews.author: N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: After care service.
customer_reviews.text: We used this product for keeping the bedroom cool in the very hot weather in the summer of 2019. This year when we wanted to start using it again we had misplaced or accidently thrown away the hose and attachment to fit it to the machine that fits onto the back of the chilly. After getting in touch with the company and explaining what we needed, nothing was too much trouble, we are very pleased with the excellent service from this company and would highly recommend them. Christine H (Surrey)
customer_reviews.author: ChrissieAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+ Aircon Unit
customer_reviews.text: I really hate the heat, it zaps my energy and makes me really miserable. all fans I have tried just end up blowing around the hot air. I decided to try an airconditioning unit and my god I wish I had done so years ago. This item does what it says on the tin, my lounge is liveable, I actually slept on the sofa last night. I am now working from home, as many are, and this is an absolute godsend - highly recommend this piece of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky, Essex

customer_reviews.title: Very weak cooling
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 portable conditioners. The other cost roughly £100 more than this. Literally night and day in terms of the quality. Avoid this air conditioner like the plague. This has barely any ability to cool the room and lacks many of the features (wifi for example) that the other one had. Considering how much of a pain this is going to be to return, I'd suggest to anyone reading this that they spring for a more expensive, better reviewed model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly pleased
customer_reviews.text: Put it to the test throughout today against the hot, muggy weather and noticed a difference in the room within a matter of minutes, left longer I was so cold I had to turn it off completely! Great to have an eco-friendly option compared to other AC units and would certainly recommend to anyone looking to cool a small to average sized room. Will be a life saver with the coming heatwave.
customer_reviews.author: Hex

customer_reviews.title: Very quickly cools
customer_reviews.text: As it stays very hot upstairs during the summer this air conditioner is a relief and quickly cools the room. It is a big very heavy unit but that is fine if you don’t need to move it around. The sleep function is useful but I found the room heated up again rapidly once the unit turned off. It does give a break in the noise though. It is quite noisy ( a bit like sleeping on a ship) but I would rather sleep through noise than heat and as the dogs settle too we all get a good sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Helen44

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than I thought. I dont get the reviews that say it is loud? It's no worse than a fan. It is extremely well made and of a good quality plastic. It cools brilliantly. So glad 8 chose this brand. Dont hesitate if you are looking for an air conditioning unit. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Simo

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Used to cool a garden room and while it cools down the room well (20sqm) it is very noisy even on its lowest setting so loses a star. That’s the only bad point.small and compact,remote is good and cools the room to an ice box when it was 30 degrees outside. For the price though it’s a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mr s campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great domestic unit!
customer_reviews.text: Some other reviews seem to have totally unrealistic expectations. This is great for domestic use, so clearly it's not going to cool an entire house. Yes it makes a noise but its no worse than a fan. I am using it in my home office. I am on conference calls virtually all day. Have it in the slowest fan speed, it provides a lovely cool temperature, I can hear fine on my calls and no one commented on the background noise. Maybe if you're not wearing a headset they would hear it but with a decent noise cancelling headset it was fine. We're really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wiltshirelass

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few days
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my one broke after a few days, it is currently being returned to Amazon but they are now listed for a higher price so to buy another would cost me an additional £70... not happy about that! Before it broke it was no louder than any others and was doing a good job of cooling a small room.
customer_reviews.author: NMay89

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other than this beauty is a complete lifesaver in this hot weather. Easy to move from room to room and so simple to set up! Makes this hot weather enjoyable being able to escape the humidity when wanting to cool down. Not too noisy either! The hum of it didn’t deter you from getting to sleep! By far the best purchase this year!!! Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great AC/dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Instantly chills the room and I’m loving it. The dehumidifier works great too. I find that I need to just keep it on for 20 minutes or so and I can feel the temperature of my room go down. I don’t find the noise level bad at all - it’s not quiet and the noise is noticeable, but I don’t find it bad or unbearable as in other reviews. Overall very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kazuya Iwata

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early, brilliant! Unboxed and working in 2 minutes or less. Conectors and hose easy to fit. Remote easy to operate. I made a quick easy window screen witn plastic and selotape, now l am chilling indoors 26 degrees and dropping, (took about 45 mins) at 30+ degrees outside. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Has been a lifesaver and chills well
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase.... it's no louder than the fans I had in my bedroom previously. I found it easy to put together and easy to operate..... it chills the room almost immediately. I am thinking about getting another one for downstairs, so I don't have to worry about finding one at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: S Jackman

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product saved my life during the heatwave, the machine works ( a bit weak, used in a 15mq2 room) but need to be really kept on all the time or all the benefit will be lost in half an hour. Noise wise is ok, hard to sleep with, around 52db, it is like having a big freezer in the room(for the noise), the sleeping mode is a joke I do not see/feel any difference. good for the price, at the end of the day is really hot a couple of weeks a year, did not want to spend too much.
customer_reviews.author: William Chuang

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: after a bit of working out great ! water filling every hour, but now unit raised onto a side table drain pipe fitted and leads into medium size bin goes all night empty in morning! also found a standard garden hose pipe fits so could make it longer
customer_reviews.author: Jay Harris maureen muttock

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: It does what you'd hope it'd do - cools the living room of my 1-bed flat very effectively, and if you leave all the doors open and windows closed, the whole place feels cooler when you return from outside. Ignore the complaints about noise - it's obviously not silent, but it's no noisier than you'd expect, and it's significantly quieter (and more effective) than the massive floor fan I was using before. It's only been a couple of weeks but I'm very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully cold.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Cools my bedroom really well. Can be heard but is not much louder than my redundant ceiling fan. Sleep and timer modes all controlled from the remote control. Amazing bit of kit for the price!
customer_reviews.author: mat targar

customer_reviews.title: Great air conditioner, well worth the price with a very communicative seller.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect air conditioner for cooling down a single room. Extremely straightforward, and beautifully cool. It makes some noise, but it’s consistent and low level so not an issue at all for us. It was very easy to set up and install, although the window attachment unit requires careful foresight because the insulating tape is extremely sticky! We ordered a second one since we were so happy with the first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with performance
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work,, won’t chill the air effectively, temperature in the room is 23C I set the machine at 19C and only got mildly cool air blowing through , slightly cool but definitely not chilled ,,, very disappointed ! I have an amcor AC upstairs , I wish I’d bought from them again
customer_reviews.author: michael penn

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed
customer_reviews.text: Today is the first day of using. So far I’m very impressed. Was quick easy to set up. My daughters room is a large room and gets very hot on a hot day. I could feel a difference within 10 mins. I wouldn’t say it is excessively noisy. This isn’t any noisier than an aircon unit in a hotel room abroad!
customer_reviews.author: SJMB

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant portable air condition
customer_reviews.text: I was truly amazed that it works so well and it doesn't have a water outlet meaning there is no faff with emptying the water all the time - i would really recommend this portable air condition. The noise is quieter than any other portable i have used (although don't be disillusioned it still makes a noise but a very acceptable one in my opinion. Very compact and easy to use, understand and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael fried

customer_reviews.title: Cools quickly in medium size bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Cools quickly and is relatively quiet compared to our old one. Seems to be efficient and his been a god send during that week of 30+ degrees and warm nights. Quiet enough for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these at the start of summer 2020 (3 of us in a house working from home). These little units are great. So much better than just a fan. They are quite heavy and you do need to vent to a window but cools a room down fast and enabled many good night sleeps through the summer. Wont use it for heating which is why I have not scored that part
customer_reviews.author: Marc Stedman

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: Despite the delivery driver dropping the unit from his shoulder to the ground with a crash the unit survived and is working really well. Our south facing, well insulated bedroom becomes uncomfortably warm during the summer and the air conditioner has made the world of difference. Of course it makes some noise but on the lower speed it's not too bad but the trade off is a cool room and a comfortable nights sleep, well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: M.Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing the item I requested two extra parts to the air venting system, as I wished to install another external vent. These two parts were supplied without question, very quickly and efficiently by 'Inventor'. The product is excellent and the after sales service is also very good!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Greene

customer_reviews.title: Very good cooling, though quite loud.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Effective, rapid cooling of a typical domestic room. Cons: Quite loud, especially when rapidly cooling, though not excessively so. It is worth the noise if you need the cooling. The timer function could be much improved to set on and off times on repeat. The sleep mode doesn't do anything as far as I can tell. The exhaust pipe should a) be insulated and b) be longer. A removable drawer-style collection tank would be much better than the current draining system.
customer_reviews.author: CalVet Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This air con unit is fantastic! Remote control for ease of use is great quality. The customer support with this company is outstanding as well. I had an issue with the unit I ordered as it wasn’t working properly. But they were absolutely on the ball and got me a replacement one out straight away. And it works fantastically. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works extremely well on well insulated homes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic.lovely and cold.perfect for these next few hot days. Our house is very well insulated so cools down very fast.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Hermes are rubbish
customer_reviews.text: The '+' button for adjusting the temperature did not work as it should on 'cool' mode so I've had to repack it all. Hermes were supposed to collect it today. After someone waited in from 8am to 8pm no one came. So far I have not been able to contact Hermes.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin O

customer_reviews.title: Works great but quite noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is great makes the room very cold, if you buy the window kit to go with it! It is quite noisy I struggle to sleep with it on but overall I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Faye.h

customer_reviews.title: DIDNT TURN ON!
customer_reviews.text: DIDNT TURN ON! recieved the item followed all installation instructions and it would not turn on. We tried multiple plug sockets and hand controller too but nothing worked. Complete nightmare trying to return too! Whole evening wasted and no air conditioner. Now have to sit in for 12 hours tomorrow in the ‘hope’ it will be collected!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. No more sleepless nights.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money just get it. Looks good and cools our medium to large room within 3-5 min switching on. Its a little on the louder side when on full fan but once its got to your chosen temp its about as noisey as a modern fridge freezer with a fan attached lol. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is quieter than other models but vibrations make it rattle increasingly annoying noise
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase this year. Was very useful during those hot days in July and August. However, I needed to buy an extension hose to move the unit further indoors. I think it would be enough for someone with a window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what you expect
customer_reviews.text: It is loud cools down the room quite well but not as powerful as you would assume. Also be prepared to have a pipe sticking out of your window so think about where you going to place it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good compact unit that works very well
customer_reviews.text: Almost instant cold air, not too noisy when on low speed, works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J

customer_reviews.title: Good value but noisy
customer_reviews.text: Not used it much, but it is more noisy than expected and more rattling like something is loose. Assume that it the operation, as the plan is not to use it through the night it should be ok for us.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Cheetham

customer_reviews.title: Now Cost £250 I paid £300
customer_reviews.text: One of those brilliant times where you pay £300 for an item, and Amazon advertises it to you for £250 a couple of weeks later. Just makes you feel cheated. Hardly portable! Tank only lasts 40 minutes!!! Needs an inbuilt pipe!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally good product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product works really well, and is better than expected. The customer service also goes above and beyond, which is really appreciated. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: quieter than previous air-cons i have bought, does not have the thump thump of the compressor
customer_reviews.text: much quieter than previous air-cons i have bought, does not have the thump thump of the compressors from other air-con units I have bought. Easy to move, looks nice
customer_reviews.author: stephen wager

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and keeps room cool
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and effective air conditioning unit cools room in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Carnice

customer_reviews.title: Good aircon, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the bedroom. Can be bit noisy but its expected from a portable aircon. Does need the hose out the window to expel the warm air out of the back while in use as aircon but all in all very happy and great price for it
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Life saver in hot weather. Dose what it's made for, The only thing is, It's a bit noisy and too fiddly to place it's hose whenever you want it on.
customer_reviews.author: Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Its heavy, it's my cooler .
customer_reviews.text: Had this a few days now and all seems ok. Certainly cools the room well. Not tried sleep mode yet. It is a bit bigger than I expected but the wheels make it easy to move about as it is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Hemsworth

customer_reviews.title: Works well in small
customer_reviews.text: Previously owned this chiller so decided to purchase another one for the living room and so far happy with it. Works alright in hot days. Too noisy though which I assume most chillers are.
customer_reviews.author: Ha

customer_reviews.title: Accessories not included
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get to use the product as the window seal parts aren't even included. What a joke...
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Life saver but needs longer hose
customer_reviews.text: Great air con unit but a little noisey. Also the exhaust pipe is too short so I needed to but an extention.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cold air.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin. Cold air where you need it. Come home to hot caravan put on aircon job done.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Cool room
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice. As soon as you buy something like this the weather turns cooler. However nice cold air to cool the room. I do need an extension vent hose to reach a window. But all good and does what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and cool
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom gets too hot on the hottest days in summer. This machine is perfect cooling me down on a hot night blowing cold air and sucking out hot air. Much better than my desk fan.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Green

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this. Cooled my large bedroom down and kept the temperature there. Noise is comparable to any aircon unit. Does its job very well
customer_reviews.author: deadgardener

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: It cools our bedroom down very well. It can be quite loud which you can get used to. The main noise issue is how often it changes pitch
customer_reviews.author: Mr KG Gray

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Must have for these really hot days and specially if you have a baby. This cools the room down and even gives you goosebumps, prefect for using it at night when you need the room to be cool before putting your baby down - lifesaver
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit
customer_reviews.text: Was bit unsure but so glad we brought this. Put it on for hour before bed then put to sleep mode and it works amazing. Makes the difference between a comfortable nights sleep and one tossing and turning because it's too hot
customer_reviews.author: alan starbuck

customer_reviews.title: Missing part damaged and wet box
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived today without the window slider A and B.The box the air conditioner was in was soaked through, ripped and smelt disgusting. The address label was stuck to the bottom of the box so the product was delivered upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a small issue With order which was resolved very quickly. Very responsive customer service
customer_reviews.author: Hayley S.

customer_reviews.title: More vertical louvres please
customer_reviews.text: Great Aircon unit,however not enough accuracy with the Louvres as there is only one vertically...and couldn't aim it away from our feet when reclined in chairs...shame
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the Chilli
customer_reviews.text: Only used this for a couple of nights, but so far, I’m impressed. It is noisy, but nowhere near as noisy as some I have come across. Definitely, able to sleep well with this running. Super cool and excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Portable air conditioner that works really well
customer_reviews.text: It's been a godsend during the recent heatwave keeping living room at a comfortable temperature and I was able to put the outlet hose up the chimney!
customer_reviews.author: Starkers

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Its good...sleep mode seems to make louder for some odd reason 🤔 As a portable air con its perfect..cools quickly.. it is heavy to carry upstairs..fine on floor as on wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great but hose is mandatory
customer_reviews.text: Good cooling level but it didn't say that if you want it on cooling then the hose has to be out of a window or the room would be warmer than when you started.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew O.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep air cool for long
customer_reviews.text: Too chunky! I used it last summer and was very disappointed. It doesn't keep the air cool as expected. You have to let it run all night if you want cool air but it's quite noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Cold
customer_reviews.text: Works well, arrived quickly. just waiting for a really hot day to see how effective it is then.
customer_reviews.author: beau ripley

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase but noisy
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very noisy. Windows sliders should be included with items as we are paying a lot of money. Otherwise it does cool the house very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Controller and manual!
customer_reviews.text: its all well and good receiving this but it would be nice to receive a manual to know what I'm doing, on top of that the advertised controller wasn't even in the box!!! 1 star if I'm not going to get what I've paid for
customer_reviews.author: Callum Sharp

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Fairly quiet and does the job... Very happy with this!!
customer_reviews.author: gary eastwood

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect , quick delivery and air con amazin. Remote control , nice amd cold for bedroom. Top quality
customer_reviews.author: Ian Fredson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in a hot day
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at cooling our lounge. Vent tube isn’t very long so we have ordered an extension tube so it can go out of the kitchen window too.
customer_reviews.author: Dr L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low running costs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Cool air supplied at a lower power usage than most Under 1 kw on full blast - much lower on tickover. Would certainly buy agai from this supplier
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and dreadful customer service from the supplier
customer_reviews.text: Returned the item over 5 weeks ago and still awaiting a refund. Poor product, awful experience and I would recommend not buying from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Standish

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: It is an extremely noisy air conditioner. I needed to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The product is compact and easy to use it start cooling after few of minutes, overall good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Joviar

customer_reviews.title: Spot on !!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Keeps a constant temperature hot or cold . Makes a large room cold in no time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Before heatwave we bought 4 aircons, noisy but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Vassiliev

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: This unit cools an average size room very quickly, however if it is a bedroom you will need ear plugs as it is very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not noisy
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Not noisy. Really cools our living/kitchen to around 17o. Works brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Mcallister

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy even on sleep mode. Fan runs constantly which is very load.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Harmer

customer_reviews.title: Cools quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought on a lightening deal so got a good price, otherwise might have returned. Does cool a room reasonably quickly but is very noisy to leave on when sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: David E.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
